summary: The history of color photography in motion pictures, in particular the Technicolor company's work.
cast: Angela Lansbury|Esther Williams|Arlene Dahl|Evelyn Keyes|John Alton|Jack Cardiff|Vittorio Storaro|Eugen Sandow|Annabelle Moore|Cammie King Conlon|Richard J. Goldberg|Robert Gitt|Fred Basten|Douglas Fairbanks|Ron Jarvis|Oswald Morris|David O. Selznick|Daniel Selznick|Jerry Maren|Ingrid Bergman|William Tuttle|Vivien Leigh|Leslie Howard|William Cameron Menzies|Herbert T. Kalmus|Tony Duquette|Thelma Schoonmaker|Kim Hunter
title: Glorious Technicolor
